kingdom.quote: The Old Ways will see us through!
kingdom.long_description: With a strong tradition of telling the stories of those that came before, the Nordlings look forward to making stories of their own!
kingdom.post_selection_description: , a society of the Tough and Brave.

nordling_archer.description: This Archer currently prefers wearing armor made by the Nordling. Click to change!

nordling_cleric.description: This Cleric currently prefers wearing armor made by the Nordling. Click to change!

nordling_footman.description: This Footman currently prefers wearing armor made by the Nordling. Click to change!

nordling_knight.description: This Knight currently prefers wearing armor made by the Nordling. Click to change!

bulletin_message.00:
He walks toward us with a brave face, and a mighty presence. This man must have some tales to tell. He sets down his small Nordling Sea-Chest at the edge of the camp.

Although, he also looks quite tired, as if walking and hiking for days.

"Greetings. I am Jarl Stoic the Vast, and I've been searching these lands for some time." Searching..."After landing, my troops and I were ambushed by an Orc invasion, and I suffered a blow to the head. Upon waking behind some brush, I found myself alone to wander about."

read_letter.choice_000: Why are you searching this land?

bulletin_message.00:
"We came to this land hoping to find the fabled home of the gods, which is elusive to me so far. I am glad to see other Nordlings brave enough to start an outpost here in this wilderness."

To survive here you will need to decide on a path of growth for your people. "The land can be developed with your wits, or your strength, or your nurturing toward the greenery."

So, remember our greatest gods: Odin, the wise protector. Thor, the strong warrior. Freya, embodiment of beauty and fertility. "Your banner will be a small symbol towards a blessing you may receive from the gods."

"I wonder which you shall choose. No matter what, Nordlings will persevere as we always have."

"You have started a fine outpost," Stoic says.

"[str(i18n_data.town_name)]" will prosper if these Nordlings work hard and keep their bravery. "Keep your wits about you, the land can be fierce at times."

"Now I must continue my search." Stoic hopes to find the missing troops, and the elusive dwelling place of the gods. "Goodbye," he gestures. "I will survey this area and return with my findings occasionally. Be well."

"This chest has been heavy," Stoic explains, and he removes a large bag of preserved nourishments. "Have this and enjoy."

We both have some hard work to do, but also need to rest and enjoy ourselves. "I can travel lighter and faster now, and you can build up your supplies to share when I return," he says. "One day this land will be ours."

The bag contains:

Stoic the Vast saunters into camp, carrying his sack of supplies.

He looks to be in good spirits, and lets out a hearty laugh!

Stoic looks around and is pleased. "I'm glad you have settled into this land, and have begun to make it your own! ," he exclaims. "I have also found some signs of the gods, there is a faint magic here. Some plants do give great energy to me".

"I have felt stronger here, and if you keep working this land and gathering its resources, you will become strong as well." It's true that the outpost is growing quickly through our Nordlings' efforts, maybe we can attain some magical blessings as well.

"You can channel your energies towards achieving a blessed new Hearth. It will attract more settlers who find their way to this unusual land."

He turns to look toward the distant hills,and grabs his Spear and Shield. "As for me, I must keep searching... after I put down that Giant Wolf there, that is staring at your stockpiles." Stoic charges forth, leaving behind some plants that fell out of his sack.
Or, our minds can envision a Hearth of Makers, and through the magical energies our productive crafters will increase our Settlement's value.

Stoic urges you, "Now focus you minds to determine the form of your Hearth:

Cheer, Glory, Makers - They are all worthy paths to take your Nordling Settlement forward!"

In Nordling lore, Hearths have been the focal point of the gatherings since the beginning.

"We get together to make battle plans, to share knowledge and craftworks, and to appreciate the harvests of our land. Our thoughts have power now."
The magic around us can create a Hearth of Cheer for those who believe that a settlement should be well fed and happy before anything else.
Lastly, a Hearth of Glory can be realized when our dreams of power and defence of our people attract some of the magic that causes natural destruction.

Jarl Stoic returns, and surveys the grounds of "[str(i18n_data.town_name)]." He is ready to hear of your choice to advance your grounds into a 'Settlement.'

"The magic in these lands will transform your Hearth into a bright beacon for others to see from afar."

intro.choice_001: [skip] We know what Hearth we want

bulletin_message.00: Jarl Stoic the Vast finds his way back to your Settlement. "You have grown again, this is good."
He shares his recent findings with you. "Travelling around this area I have met some new people, and it has confirmed my ideas of this land being blessed by the gods."
Stoic looks around and motions everyone closer in. "The people I've met know that a great Town can be started here if us Nordlings can construct a Shrine to the gods!"

"Well, you will have to wait for me to return with some special guests, who can teach you of the Shrine making ways."

Stoic rises, thanking you for the warm meal, before setting out again...
Stoic brings a group of Travellers. "Nordlings of [str(i18n_data.town_name)], I bring to you some fellow wanderers from this land."

"Now the gods will grant you their favor, once you build a Shrine toward them. You only need to decide which god you wish to receive a blessing from."

The guests take turns explaining how to construct a Shrine.

Valkyrie Hilda looks up to the heavens, then speaks,
"I have been stranded on this land. My great friend, a flying horse, was captured by some old barbarians. If you could plant a special shrine seed, I'm sure goddess Freya will be pleased!
I hope her recognition can provide me a passage to return home to the heavens."
(Building a Shrine to Freya will grant all your townsfolk a +1 boost to the mind, body, and spirit attributes.)
"Hilda! That's terrible that your magnificent horse was captured!  It was not me, I'm just saying..."

"Ahem, it was not I either, Hilda," says the Lone Wanderer, as he strokes his grey beard. "Our great protector god Odin, will be surely honored if you put all your attention and effort into building a shrine in his likeness.
Be careful in using your tools, you wouldn't want to lose an eye, now."
(Building a Shrine to Odin will grant Seidr magical abilities, allowing the creation of Masterwork quality crafted goods.)

"I am Eitri, and I search this land with my brother Brokkr, looking for unusual ingredients.  We are strong and sturdy Dwarven Blacksmiths, tasked with producing wondrous objects for the gods. Brokkr, stop drinking that Ale, and get over here!"

Brokkr sets down his drink, and swats at a speedy big black fly.
"Eitri, I'm just thirsty! My buddy Thundergod Thor is so mighty! And he loves hammers, so building a massive hammer will surely grant his blessings upon you!"
(Building a Shrine to Thor will grant you the might to use Mythril ore in crafting exceptionally powerful equipment.)

Stoic slowly walks around the Hearth. "Now you have received the instructions from our guests. Decide which of the old gods favour you most desire, to establish this great Nordling Town."

The people gather together to choose their Destiny...

unlock_shrine_recipes.bulletin_title: Mason Decoration Odin and Thor Shrine recipes unlocked!

unlock_shrine_recipes_2.bulletin_title: Herbalist Decoration Freya Shrine Seed recipe unlocked!

valor.name: Shrine to Thor
valor.description:
This Township shall be dedicated to Thor's valorous example to protect all of the Nine Realms.
  • Unlocks Legendary weapon recipes
  • Unlocks castle decoration recipes

guildmaster.name: Shrine to Odin
guildmaster.description:
This Township shall be known for its artisans' pursuit of wisdom and magical crafting.
  • Allows crafting Masterwork quality items
  • Unlocks artisan-themed decoration recipes

deity.name: Shrine To Freya
deity.description:
This Township emulates the kindness of Freya, and a respect for nature like no other.
  • Blesses all citizens with +1 to Mind, Body, and Spirit
  • Unlocks nature-themed decoration recipes, and blesses your shrine, especially...

shrine_upgrade.title: Township Established
shrine_upgrade.reward_message: By the will of the gods, we recognize:
shrine_upgrade.reward_message_ctd: For harnessing the powers of the land. The town is hereby eligible for:

bulletin_message.00: She walks about, gazing at the workshops, and the trees at the edge of town.  Then she notices a new plant growing, from the blessed seed.
"Freya has blessed this land.  There will one day soon be an enormous tree.  I hope to reach the top of it, so Freya can hear my call," Hilda muses.
The growth of this Legendary Tree imparts a growth in everyones Mind, Body, and Spirit. "Be well, and keep on growing your Town. Its amazing here!"
The Lone Wanderer speaks quietly, "From atop the mountain, I've been watching this town grow. The ravens told me they have seen you all working diligently and so, you deserve to be seen by the gods."

"When I entered the forest, I found the Jarl Stoic. He told me how he has seen your town grow, in both strength, and ability of craftsmanship.  You were slowly absorbing the land's magical shards into your bodies and minds."

The Lone Wanderer leaves you with a final word, "Odin has imparted his favour on you. The gathered magic will manifest itself in your craftworks, you now are practicers of the Seidr."

His wisdom reminds us of the Allfather Odin.
Brokkr stares at the giant hammer monument, The Shrine to Thor. "The runes on this Shrine are glowing bright as lightning, Thor can see you now."
Now Eitri looks toward the Blacksmith workshop, and wanders over. "Blacksmith, you have been granted the might to forge Mythril ore into some magnificent equipment.  Keep your fires hot!"

Brokkr rubs his hands together, and stretches his arms towards the fire. "The children of the snake god will be defeated by you Nordlings.  Thundergod Thor is on your side, and you will be heroes weilding the mighty Mythril weaponry!"
Stoic bellows, "Well done, Nordlings!  You are truly a Town now with the eyes of the gods upon you.  Many will come to share in your glory."

"Perhaps I can take a break from my endless searching. I would like to share stories with your own Nordling Jarl. And, you may have made your very own Home of the gods right here, in this special land."

Jarl Stoic looks into the Sea-Chest that he left here long ago. " By Odin's beard! The special guests left behind some fine treasures for you to use. This is your Destiny, your Town will always have a welcoming Hearth for all new Nordlings!"

"These supplies might help you refine some excellent objects," Stoic says.

The chest contains:

"Nordlings, the old gods find you worthy, and give you an opportunity to venture forth and start another Town. You may choose some wise, and able citizens, and some goods you have obtained."

Re-embarking allows you to carry over up to 3 citizens, 10 items, and all your unlocked recipes when starting a new town.

levels.description: Gained by levelling up on any job.
levels.6_description: They have six job levels! They have walked the path of a master!
levels.12_description: They now have twelve job levels! More than a master, a grand master!
levels.18_description: They have eighteen job levels! What? That's amazing!
levels.30_description: They've reached thirty job levels, only few and dedicated souls can achieve that...
levels.60_description: They've reached the impressive mark of sixty job levels! That's more experience than many hearthlings combined... Such wisdom!
levels.90_description: They have ninety job levels - this is unbelievable! No hearthling could ever dream of such a feat... Their soul must've been touched by Odin himself!

slayer.100_description: They defeated 100 foes! Was that really necessary?
slayer.250_description: They defeated 250 foes! They can't be stopped!
slayer.600_description: They defeated 600 foes! That has to be a war crime or something...

slayer_item.100_description: It defeated 100 foes! Probably needs some polishing.
slayer_item.250_description: It defeated 250 foes! This should be enough.

goblin_killer.10_description: They killed 10 goblins! There they went, killing again!
goblin_killer.25_description: They killed 25 goblins! They're really good at it!
goblin_killer.50_description: They killed 50 goblins! That's a lot!
goblin_killer.75_description: They killed 75 goblins! Where are they finding all these goblins?!
goblin_killer.100_description: They killed 100 goblins! Perhaps they should be in therapy, reexamining their priorities.

goblin_killer_item.10_description: It killed 10 goblins! Will it stop?
goblin_killer_item.25_description: It killed 25 goblins! It's really good at it!
goblin_killer_item.50_description: It killed 50 goblins! That's a lot!
goblin_killer_item.75_description: It killed 75 goblins! It's unstoppable, at least by goblins!
goblin_killer_item.100_description: It killed 100 goblins! Has its blood lust finally been sated?

orc_killer.description: Gained by killing followers of the Red Kiln.
orc_killer.5_description: They killed 5 followers of the Red Kiln!
orc_killer.10_description: They killed 10 followers of the Red Kiln! What a challenger!
orc_killer.25_description: They killed 25 followers of the Red Kiln! That requires some skills!
orc_killer.50_description: They killed 50 followers of the Red Kiln! Will they ever stop?
orc_killer.75_description: They killed 75 followers of the Red Kiln! Surely the orcs are convinced by now?
orc_killer.100_description: They killed 100 followers of the Red Kiln! They are worthy of this land!

orc_killer_item.description: Gained by killing followers of the Red Kiln.
orc_killer_item.5_description: It killed 5 followers of the Red Kiln!
orc_killer_item.10_description: It killed 10 followers of the Red Kiln! A fine weapon!
orc_killer_item.25_description: It killed 25 followers of the Red Kiln! That's something!
orc_killer_item.50_description: It killed 50 followers of the Red Kiln! It strikes fear in their hearts!
orc_killer_item.75_description: It killed 75 followers of the Red Kiln! Nothing can stop it!
orc_killer_item.100_description: It killed 100 followers of the Red Kiln! This land is finally safe.

undead_killer.6_description: They killed 6 undead! Is 'killed' even the proper word?
undead_killer.25_description: They killed 25 undead! It feels safer already.
undead_killer.50_description: They killed 50 undead! The long night is over.

undead_killer_item.6_description: It killed 6 undead! What a blessing!
undead_killer_item.15_description: It killed 15 undead! Should be safe to go out tonight.
undead_killer_item.25_description: It killed 25 undead! It definitely did its part!
undead_killer_item.50_description: It killed 50 undead! A beacon of hope!

forest_killer.description: Gained by killing minions of the Wilds.
forest_killer.5_description: They killed 5 minions of the Wilds!
forest_killer.10_description: They killed 10 minions of the Wilds! Entlings, beware!
forest_killer.25_description: They killed 25 minions of the Wilds! Where's the howling now?
forest_killer.50_description: They killed 50 minions of the Wilds! It feels calmer out there...
forest_killer.75_description: They killed 75 minions of the Wilds! Deforestation is a crime!
forest_killer.100_description: They killed 100 minions of the Wilds! Shouldn't nature be your friend?

forest_killer_item.description: Gained by killing minions of the Wilds.
forest_killer_item.5_description: It killed 5 minions of the Wilds!
forest_killer_item.10_description: It killed 10 minions of the Wilds! Firewood, anyone?
forest_killer_item.25_description: It killed 25 minions of the Wilds! A ranger would be proud!
forest_killer_item.50_description: It killed 50 minions of the Wilds! What did nature do to it?
forest_killer_item.75_description: It killed 75 minions of the Wilds! It's time to stop, perhaps?
forest_killer_item.100_description: It killed 100 minions of the Wilds! Nature will never forget this!

titan_killer.5_description: They killed 5 corrupted beings! Such bravery!
titan_killer.10_description: They killed 10 corrupted beings! They stood against darkness!
titan_killer.15_description: They killed 15 corrupted beings! Made a difference during the last battle.
titan_killer.25_description: They killed 25 corrupted beings! They tipped the odds of light against darkness!

titan_killer_item.10_description: It killed 10 corrupted beings! Worthy of a song!
titan_killer_item.15_description: It killed 15 corrupted beings! A weapon of legend!
titan_killer_item.25_description: It killed 25 corrupted beings! This world shall remember its name.

ogre_killer.30_description: They killed 30 ogres! Size really doesn't matter.

ogre_killer_item.12_description: It killed 12 ogres! Maybe it was designed for that?
ogre_killer_item.30_description: It killed 30 ogres! What an epic weapon!

mountain_killer.description: Gained by killing the ogre boss.
mountain_killer.1_description: They've killed the most fearsome ogre!

mountain_killer_item.description: Gained by killing the ogre boss.
mountain_killer_item.1_description: It was used to kill the most fearsome ogre!

varanus_killer.description: Gained by killing varani and such.
varanus_killer.10_description: They killed 10 lizards! Careful with their teeth!
varanus_killer.25_description: They killed 25 lizards! But no dragons yet...
varanus_killer.50_description: They killed 50 lizards! The species is probably endangered!

varanus_killer_item.description: Gained by killing varani and such.
varanus_killer_item.25_description: It killed 25 lizards! Probably needs cleaning!
varanus_killer_item.50_description: It killed 50 lizards! Probably some amphibians too.

zilla_killer.description: Gained by killing the lizard boss.
zilla_killer.1_description: They've killed the most fearsome lizard!

zilla_killer_item.description: Gained by killing the lizard boss.
zilla_killer_item.1_description: It was used to kill the most fearsome lizard!

leader_killer.3_description: They killed 3 enemy leaders! Cut the serpent's head!
leader_killer.5_description: They killed 5 enemy leaders! Enemies won't settle here...
leader_killer.10_description: They killed 10 enemy leaders! Chaos in their ranks!

leader_killer_item.5_description: It killed 5 enemy leaders! They'll think twice now...
leader_killer_item.10_description: It killed 10 enemy leaders! It loves anarchy!

ogo_killer.description: Gained by killing the goblin boss.
ogo_killer.1_description: They've killed the most fearsome goblin!

ogo_killer_item.description: Gained by killing the goblin boss.
ogo_killer_item.1_description: It was used to kill the most fearsome goblin!

warchief_killer.description: Gained by defeating the orc boss.
warchief_killer.1_description: They've bested the most fearsome orc in combat!

warchief_killer_item.description: Gained by defeating the orc boss.
warchief_killer_item.1_description: It was used to best the most fearsome orc in combat!

hunter.30_description: They hunted 30 wild animals! Poor animals...
hunter.75_description: They hunted 75 wild animals! That's food for months!
hunter.150_description: They hunted 150 wild animals! Is it an obsession?
hunter.300_description: They hunted 300 wild animals! Someone really loves barbecue!
hunter.600_description: They hunted 600 wild animals! Be careful to not cause an extinction!

hunter_item.30_description: It hunted 30 wild animals! It has just started!
hunter_item.75_description: It hunted 75 wild animals! A true hunting weapon!
hunter_item.150_description: It hunted 150 wild animals! No forest is safe...
hunter_item.300_description: It hunted 300 wild animals! That's a lot of jerky.
hunter_item.600_description: It hunted 600 wild animals! Vegetarians must hate it!

defender.description: Gained by getting kill assists (being involved in combat directly with or near killed enemies).
defender.25_description: They defended the town from 25 enemies!
defender.50_description: They defended the town from 50 enemies!
defender.100_description: They defended the town from 100 enemies! Is it finally safe?
defender.500_display_name: the Long Floating Hand of the Law
defender.500_description: They defended the town from 500 enemies! What an incredibly adversarial town!
defender.1000_description: They defended the town from 1000 enemies! Perhaps a more diplomatic approach is warranted.

prolific_crafter.description: Gained by crafting a lot of items.
prolific_crafter.500_description: They crafted 500 items! Maybe they could use an assistant.
prolific_crafter.1000_description: They crafted 1000 items! They'd better have a nice pension lined up.

excellent_crafter.description: Gained by crafting items of excellent quality.

master_crafter.description: Gained by crafting items of masterwork quality.
master_crafter.1_description: They crafted a masterwork quality item! Amazing!
master_crafter.10_description: They crafted 10 masterwork quality items! Incredible!
master_crafter.25_description: They crafted 25 masterwork quality items! Who knew that was even possible?

starving.description: Gained by spending a lot of time being very hungry.
starving.2_description: They've starved for 2 days and are still standing!
starving.3_description: They've starved for 10 days! Perhaps food gathering should be slightly more prioritized.

incapacitated.description: Gained by becoming incapacitated multiple times.
incapacitated.1_description: They have walked the edge of life and death! Exciting!
incapacitated.2_description: They've been knocked down and gotten up just to be knocked back down again...
incapacitated.4_description: They've been incapacitated 4 times! Is it even possible to kill them?
incapacitated.8_description: They've been incapacitated 8 times! Will they ever learn to avoid life-threatening situations?
incapacitated.12_description: They've been incapacitated 12 times! For how long can they trick death like this?
incapacitated.20_description: They've been incapacitated 20 times! It is unbelievable how lucky (or foolish) they are.

swimming.description: Gained by spending a lot of time swimming.
swimming.1_description: They've spent a whole day swimming!
swimming.2_description: They've spent three whole days swimming! They must love water.
swimming.3_description: They've spent a whole month swimming! Such energy!
swimming.4_description: They've spent three months swimming! What?!
swimming.5_description: They've spent half a year swimming! I bet the other half was sleeping...

sweet_energy.description: Gained by eating a lot of sweet foods!
sweet_energy.1_description: They have eaten sweet foods 10 times! Still healthy enough, probably.
sweet_energy.2_description: They have eaten sweet foods 25 times! Who can resist some candy?
sweet_energy.3_description: They have eaten sweet foods 50 times! They really like it!
sweet_energy.4_description: They have eaten sweet foods 100 times! That's a lot, watch out for your sugar levels!
sweet_energy.5_description: They have eaten sweet foods 200 times! That's probably not healthy...
sweet_energy.6_description: They have eaten sweet foods 500 times! Did they even manage to sleep lately?

drunk.description: Gained by spending a lot of time quite woozy because of alcoholic drinks.
drunk.1_description: They've been more there than here for six days! That's a lot!
drunk.2_description: They've spent twelve entire days feeling quite, quite light-headed!
drunk.3_description: They've been drinking for twenty entire days. Are they even working?
drunk.4_description: They've been merry for forty-five days. That's a lot of time to think...
drunk.5_description: They've spent an entire year drinking. Honestly, we should just give them an award!

morning_after.description: Gained by exaggerating a bit too much when drinking...
morning_after.1_description: They did it! No one is perfect, everyone does it eventually... They've had too many drinks and will enjoy a nice morning after...
morning_after.2_description: They have passed the point and had a lot of drinks... Six times already! Perhaps they want some help?
morning_after.3_description: They have had a bad morning after like eighteen times... They probably enjoy it somehow!
morning_after.4_description: They have been there and back again sixty times! Live and die by the bottle, they say...

bee_swarmed.description: Gained by being swarmed by bees.
bee_swarmed.1_description: They have been swarmed by bees once. Ouch, that probably hurts...
bee_swarmed.2_description: They have been swarmed by bees 5 times now! That's a lot, they're definitely not allergic to it.
bee_swarmed.3_description: They have been swarmed by bees 15 times. Do they look like a flower or something? Bees really love them!
bee_swarmed.4_description: They have been swarmed by bees 30 times! This is crazy, maybe bees just really want to follow them. Or maybe you should make them a beekeeper's hat...

forest.description: Tall pines and vast forests encompassing rocky outcrops. Default home of the Nordlings.

spring.description: Spring in the Midgard Forest is a season of change. The lowlands around the lakes start to thaw out and young grass begins to sprout.

summer.description: Summer in the Midgard Forest is a season of rest. The weather is mild, and the lowlands are green with grass. It is a reprieve from the cold, and a time to regather strength.

autumn.description: Autumn in the Midgard Forest is a season of wind and storms. It is the last chance to build shelter before the coming winter arrives.

winter.description: Winter in the Midgard Forest is a season of a few cold months. Weather is harsh, with winds and blizzards making farming difficult. Dress warmly to work outside.

juice_bramble.description: A fruity and tasty beverage from bramble berries.

map_table_ghost.description: A table with a map on it

wooden_chair_fur_ghost.description: A chair Covered with a fur

charcoal_mound_phase_2.description: Its nearly at it hottest!, nearly time to close it up

charcoal_mound_phase_3.description: Now that its closed up, it wont take long before you can harvest the charcoal!

hotspring_steam_generator_ghost.description: Generates steam particules to simulate a Hotspring

wooden_chair_nordlings_ghost.description: no one really needs that fourth leg, right?

ornate_comfy_fur_bed_ghost.description: Makes you both warm AND stylish

ornate_wooden_chair_nordlings_ghost.description: Stylish, and only has three legs!

nordling_throne_ghost.description: A throne, for kings of old.

nordling_tent_ghost.description: A tent, to protect you from the elements when camping

basic_shelter_ghost.description: Keeps the rain out, and some of the heat in. better than sleeping outside on the floor!

basic_shelter_improved_ghost.description: Keeps the rain out, and some of the heat in. Improved comfort is achieved with thatching.

nordlings_town_banner_guardian_ghost.description: How you know you've come home.
nordlings_town_banner_guardian_ghost.town_bonus_description:
This settlement will be a bustling hub of trade.
  • Roads give 3x their normal speed boost
  • Your items sell for 50% more
  • Traders will bring 2x the goods and Gold

town_banner_guardian_token_iconic.description: A shred from the Banner of Cunning, carrying along its magic.

nordlings_town_banner_guardian_token_ico.description: A shred of the banner of cunning, carrying along its magic

nordlings_town_banner_might_ghost.description: How you know you've come home
nordlings_town_banner_might_ghost.town_bonus_description:
This settlement will grow strong through earth and steel.
  • Mining gives 50% more Ore, Stone, and Clay
  • Hearthlings no longer mind cramped spaces

nordlings_town_banner_might_token_iconic.description: A shred from the Banner of Strength, carrying along its magic.

nordlings_town_banner_nature_ghost.description: How you know you've come home
nordlings_town_banner_nature_ghost.town_bonus_description:
This settlement shall be at one with the environment.
  • Trees produce 25% more Wood
  • Both Plants and Crops grow 25% faster
  • Plants have 2x their normal Appeal

nordlings_town_banner_nature_token_iconi.description: A shred from the Banner of Vitality, carrying along its magic.

herald_brokkr.description: A Dwarf Blacksmith, brother of Eitri.

herald_eitri.description: A Dwarf Blacksmith, brother of Brokkr.

bronze_axe_iconic.description: Good at chopping, and easy to repair!

iron_axe_iconic.description: A sturdy axe with an iron axe head.

steel_axe_iconic.description: A high quality axe with a Steel axe head.

stone_spear.description: A spear with a stone spearhead

stone_spear_iconic.description: A long shaft of wood with a stone spearhead

mythril_axe_iconic.description: An extremely light, extremely sharp Mythril axe.

einherjar_axe.description: A double headed axe, used by Hersir.

einherjar_axe_iconic.description: A double headed axe, used by Hersir.

bronze_sword_viking.description: A well crafted, one handed steel sword. Fit for a Viking

iron_sword_viking.description: A well crafted, one handed iron sword. Fit for a Viking

steel_sword_viking.description: A well crafted, one handed steel sword. Fit for a Viking

mythril_sword_viking.description: A well crafted, one handed Mythril sword. Fit for a Viking Hero

mythril_sword_viking_iconic.description: Lighter than steel and twice as strong!

legendary_hammer.description: Overwhelming power, and control over lightning. Too bad the handle is a bit short
Overwhelming power, and control over lightning. Too bad the handle is a bit short

iron_axe_2h_iconic.description: For cutting down monsters, not trees!

ruler_sword_ac.description: Promotes a hearthling into a King

ruler_sword_ac_iconic.description: Promotes a Hearthling into a King

ruler_sword_ascendency_iconic.description: A sword fit for a Ruler

legendary_axe_iconic.description: The edge seems sharp enough to shave with..

legendary_axe.description: The edge seems sharp enough to shave with..

bow.description: Used by a Skirmisher for shooting arrows.

bow_talisman.description: Required to promote a Huskarl to a Skirmisher

einherjar_axe_steel.description: To be Wielded by the strongest, once Ragnarok comes.

einherjar_axe_steel_iconic.description: Suitable for a Hero of Ragnarok

ruler_sword_nordlings_iconic.description: A Sword Belonging to a Jarl

einherjar_sword_steel_iconic.description: A heavy blade, used by the Hersir.

einherjar_sword_steel.description: A heavy blade, used by the Hersir.

wooden_spear_talisman.description: Required to promote a Villager into a Huskarl

wooden_spear_iconic.description: Stick em with the pointy end!

composite_longbow.description: A long bow made out of multiple materials, improving its performance

runic_wooden_comb.description: Runic magic will protect your head, who needs helmets!

runic_bronze_comb.description: Runic magic will protect your head, who needs helmets!

runic_iron_comb.description: Runic magic will protect your head, who needs helmets!

runic_steel_comb.description: Runic magic will protect your head, who needs helmets!

runic_mythril_comb.description: Runic magic will protect your head, who needs helmets!

chain_mail_bronze.description: Multiple bronze rings woven together into a protective vest

chain_mail_bronze_iconic.description: It jingles when you touch it

cloth_armour.description: Light armor, might soften a blow or two

chain_mail_iron_iconic.description: Light armor, might soften a blow or two

leather_armour.description: Light armor, slightly better than cloth

leather_armour_iconic.description: Light armor, slightly better than cloth

chain_mail_iron.description: Multiple iron rings woven together into a protective vest

chain_mail_iron_iconic.description: It jingles when you touch it

chain_mail_steel.description: Multiple steel rings woven together into a protective vest

chain_mail_steel_iconic.description: It jingles when you touch it

chain_mail_mythril.description: Multiple Mythril rings woven together into a protective vest

chain_mail_mythril_iconic.description: It jingles when you touch it

training_roundshield.description: Wooden boards nailed together, nothing fancy

wooden_round_shield.description: A wooden roundshield, faced with linen

wooden_round_shield_iconic.description: your Hearthling will decorate this before use!

iron_round_shield.description: A linen faced wooded roundshield, with a sturdy iron band around the edge

iron_round_shield_iconic.description: your Hearthling will decorate this before use!

steel_round_shield.description: A linen faced wooded roundshield, with a sturdy steel band around the edge

steel_round_shield_iconic.description: your Hearthling will decorate this before use!

sword_sheeth.description: Holds your sword when not in use.

einherjar_axe_offhand.description: A Weapon for a True Hero

weapon_belt_hanger.description: A belt loop for holding weapons in

runes_fire_projectile.description: An Amulet for your skirmisher, encasing his weapons in flame

runes_slowing_projectile.description: An Amulet for your skirmisher, causing his weapons to slow

einherjar_axe_offhand_steel.description: Fit to be wielded by a hero.

gold_ring.description: A band of solid gold, signifying loyalty

runic_silver_comb.description: Runic magic will protect your head, who needs helmets!

runic_silver_comb_iconic.description: Runic magic will protect your head, who needs helmets!

sacred_apple.description: A sacred apple, rumored to bestow godly vigor

rune_stone.description: An enscribed runestone, holding ancient knowledge... but mostly its pretty

rune_stone_iconic.description: We dont know how, but the stonemason shrunk it down.

fireplace_ghost.description: Keeps your house nice and warm!

decorative_wall_shield_ghost.description: Not for actual battle, but decorative!

firepit_hearth_ghost.description: May the flames of war clear your way.

fireplace_big_ghost.description: A larger fireplace, for when you need more heat.

shrine_to_odin_ghost.description: A Shrine to the Wisdom of Odin, King of the Gods.

shrine_to_thor_ghost.description: A Shrine to the Protector Thor, God of Thunder.

shrine_to_freya_ghost.description: Plant this seed down, it only grows from goddess Freya's blessing.

shrine_to_freya_half_grown.description: A world tree sprout, given more time and space it will grow further.

shrine_to_freya_mid_grown.description: A young world tree, it will still grow further, with enough clearing.

shrine_to_freya_fully_grown.description: The world tree, connecting your Nordling Town to the Nine Realms.

shrine_to_freya_blessed.description: A seed blessed by goddess Freya, clear some space for it and enjoy the ride.

decorative_wall_dragon_ghost.description: A decorative dragon carved out of wood

bee_hive.description: Buzzy bees make honey for thee!

mega_cabbage.description: I think, you are going to need more sallads.

firewood.description: A bundle of firewood, will keep you warm during the cold dark night.

hops.description: Used to flavor beer, or for making medicine

mythril_ingot.description: A bar of pure Mythril, worth a King's ransom.

leather_strip.description: A strip of leather, used for crafting.

legendary_hammer_haft.description: A hammer haft, made strong as a mountain.

legendary_hammer_mounting.description: Made of Highly conductive gold... It seems to spark to the touch.

legendary_hammer_head.description: It seems to thrum with power.

000.description: Planted to grow a meager food supply.
000.name: Bramble Bush Seed

001.description: Just needs some time and care.
001.name: Bramble Bush Sproutling

003.description: It's almost there!  Look, it has buds!
003.name: Budding Bramble Bush

bramble_bush_crop.description: Can be harvested for a small supply of fruits

002.name: Growing White Carrot
002.description: A novice at this whole growing thing by now

011.name: Rotten Cabbage
011.description: Rotten and stinks like the blazes

002.name: Spouting beanstalk
002.description: Are you sure these arent magic?

005.name: Ripe beanstalk
005.description: Ripe Beans on a stalk, Harvest now!

000.name: Hops Sapling
000.description: Will grow into the hops plant.

stone_pine_tree_crop.description: Out of trees? Get ready to participate in reforestation.

003.name: Stone Pine Sapling
003.description: Ready to be transferred to a bigger plot.

000.name: Stone Pine Berry
000.description: A new pine tree taking root.

002.name: Stone Pine Sprout
002.description: A perfect tiny pine. Still growing!

onion_crop.description: Onions, good to eat on their own, but better when baked or fried!

bramble_bush.description: Harvestable for a meager food supply.

bramble_bush_plant_seed_ghost.description: Can be planted to grow a meager food supply

bramble_bush_plant_bud.description: It's almost there!  Look, it has buds!

bramble_bush_plant_sprout.description: Just needs some time and care.

cabbage_basket.description: A cabbage in a basket. Its that simple.

white_carrot_basket.description: A hardy old species of carrot

bramble_serving.description: Can't wait to put this in some pie!

buttermilk.description: A byproduct of cheese production, and a staple food for Nordlings

beans_seeds.description: Use these to unlock beans as a crop!

white_carrot_seeds.description: Enables White Carrots as a crop!

fuel_holder_large_wood.description: Holds a lot of drink, also looks cool!

nord_chest_ghost.description: Stores up to 64 items. Useful for keeping things in the house, but also at sea!

tree_stone_pine_seed.description: Can be planted to grow a giant Stone-Pine tree.

tree_stone_pine_seed_ghost.description: Can be planted to grow a giant Stone-Pine tree.

tree_stone_pine_plant_bud.description: It's almost there!  It's growing stronger needles!

small_stone_pine_tree.description: The smell of fresh pine needles surrounds this tree

small_stone_pine_tree_iconic.description: Plant it in the earth and watch it grow.

ancient_stone_pine_tree.description: Fully Grown, and impressive in stature.

sapling_stone_pine_tree_ghost.description: Grows into a tall Stone-Pine tree.

cloth_armour.description: This triple-quilted vest provides more protection to your combat units than mere clothing. Not a lot more, but every little bit helps, right?

leather_armour.description: Hardened leather provides study protection against light weapons.

worker_outfit_fancy_recipe.description: Keeps you warm, and looks good too!
worker_outfit_fancy_recipe.flavor: "its a Troll? its a Bear! no its a Nordling!"

leather_strip_recipe.description: Produces three leather strips, used in crafting
leather_strip_recipe.flavor: What else would you wrap handles with?

weaver_workbench_recipe.description: Used to craft things out of Fibre or Leather
weaver_workbench_recipe.flavor: "A golden fleece is nice and all but I sure prefer a norman sheep for its heat-retention capabilities.." -Mer Burlyhands

nordling_tent.flavor: Well, you didnt expect us to sleep in beds under the open sky now did you?

ac_tent.flavor: Humble beginnings. Beats sleeping in the outside air.

na_tent.flavor: What do you mean "where did you get the hide?" -Hilde, Northern Alliance tentmaker
na_tent.description: Keeps the weather out, and the happiness IN

rc_tent.flavor: "Why tents in the desert? Have you tried sleeping in the baking sun or the freezing night?"

weaver_workbench_nordlings_ghost.description: Used to craft things out of fibre or leather

bee_hive.description: Bees live in here and make honey!

bramble_bush_transmute_recipe.flavor: Only a skilled hand can harvest the weaker seeds, but the fruit is lost in the process.

runes_slowing_projectile_recipe.description: An Amulet for your skirmisher, causing his weapons to slow

runes_fire_projectile_recipe.description: An Amulet for your skirmisher, encasing his weapons in flame

shrine_to_freya_recipe.description: A Mysterious Seed, sure to amaze
shrine_to_freya_recipe.flavor: "Start with blessed water, add the foundation of the world, and finish up by adding this to a life most precious, bathed in the light of the stars..." -unknown Druid

bee_hive_recipe.flavor: As delicious as it is healthy! -Olaf Olafsson

earthbud_plant_recipe.description: Harvestable for concentrated Hearth Essence and more Hearthbud Seeds

oak_tree_recipe.description: Plant the Sapling to grow a noble Oak Tree
oak_tree_recipe.flavor: Godess Freya admires the Oak Tree

summon_stone_hotspring_recipe.description: Warm up and relax in this natural wonder.

beans_seeds_recipe.description: Usable by farmers to grow beans
beans_seeds_recipe.flavor: Will -Probably- not grow a huge beanstalk to a sky castle.

white_carrot_seeds_recipe.description: Allows you to grow White Carrots

hops_seeds_recipe.flavor: Wort in beer is fine, but when given the chance, the hops are mine!

cleric_scroll_recipe.description: Used to promote a herbalist into a Skald
cleric_scroll_recipe.flavor: Placeholder. got a good idea? message me on the mod page.

footman_description.description: The Huskarl is a swift melee fighter, and the backbone of your town's army.

level_4_data.perk_000_description: The Huskarl is now practiced at optimizing the effect of each blow.

level_1_data.perk_000_description: The Huskarl knows that all battles may have mortal consequences, and attacks with renewed determination.

level_3_data.perk_000_description: This powerful, overhead swing deals double damage.

level_2_data.perk_000_description: The Huskarl charges into battle with speed

level_5_data.perk_000_description: A slashing strike that deals damage to up to 4 enemies around the Huskarl's target

damage_1_buff.description: At Level 1, the Huskarl attacks with increased ferocity

damage_2_buff.description: The Huskarl attacks with increased ferocity

damage_3_buff.description: At Level 6, the Huskarl's attacks are unstoppable!

footman_outfit.description: Has a conveniant belt for equipment!

mythril_ingot.flavor: Makes dwarves anvious, and dragons interested!

bronze_sword_viking.flavor: It's sharp and pointy, but I'd still prefer an axe! ~ Mordlock Brokkir, Nordling berserker

iron_sword_viking.flavor: It's sharp and pointy, but I'd still prefer an axe! ~ Mordlock Brokkir, Nordling berserker

steel_sword_viking.flavor: It's sharp and pointy, but I'd still prefer an axe! ~ Mordlock Brokkir, Nordling berserker

mythril_sword_viking.flavor: Made of ancient treasures, fit for slaying ancient beasts

legendary_hammer.flavor: And it shall be called: Mjolnir

stone_axe.description: An Axe with a stone axehead

bronze_axe.description: An Axe with a bronze axehead

iron_axe.description: An Axe with a iron axehead
iron_axe.flavor: ooh I'm cut just looking at it!

steel_axe.description: An Axe with a steel axehead
steel_axe.flavor: hey, where did my arm go?

mythril_axe.description: An Axe with a mythril axehead
mythril_axe.flavor: Let me axe you a question... IN THE FACE! ~ Borden Brokkir, Mordlock's twin brother

bronze_spear.flavor: Stick em with the pointy end! -Bragi oathbreaker

iron_spear.flavor: Svartalves fear cold iron the most, but it works on other buggers too

steel_spear.flavor: They say Magnus Gunnarsson held off three waves of the Red Kiln with a spear just like this one

chain_mail_bronze.description: Bronze rings woven together forming a protective vest
chain_mail_bronze.flavor: rings of bronze and leather under, to stop the wearer being torn asunder ~Narfi the Skald

chain_mail_iron.description: Iron rings woven together forming a protective vest
chain_mail_iron.flavor: hammering out iron made mail, hoping in battle it will never fail ~Narfi the Skald

chain_mail_steel.description: Steel rings woven together forming a protective vest
chain_mail_steel.flavor: Rings of steel, forged in fire, to turn back the orc-kin's ire ~Narfi the Skald

chain_mail_mythril.description: Mythril rings woven together forming a protective vest
chain_mail_mythril.flavor: As light as a feather, and as hard as dragon's scales.

runic_bronze_comb.description: A runic comb that takes care of your hair. Let your hair take care of you!
runic_bronze_comb.flavor: Also does wonders for your beard!

runic_iron_comb.description: A runic comb that takes care of your hair. Let your hair take care of you!
runic_iron_comb.flavor: Also does wonders for your beard!

runic_steel_comb.description: A runic comb that takes care of your hair. Let your hair take care of you!
runic_steel_comb.flavor: Also does wonders for your beard!

runic_mythril_comb.description: A runic comb that takes care of your hair. Let your hair take care of you!
runic_mythril_comb.flavor: Also does wonders for your beard!

iron_round_shield.description: A linen covered roundshield, with an iron band

steel_round_shield.description: A linen covered roundshield, with a sturdy steel band

einherjar_axe_offhand_talisman.description: A large double headed axe, for promoting a Huskarl to a Hersir.
einherjar_axe_offhand_talisman.flavor: And Narfi took two heads with one mighty stroke.

blacksmith_workbench_nordlings_recipe.flavor: "What else do we cut in half to test the sharpness?"

legendary_hammer_head.description: Heavy as time, Strikes like Lightning!

legendary_hammer_haft.flavor: "Keep that damn mosquito away from me!" -Eitri

legendary_hammer_recipe.description: A Legendary Hammer, worthy of the god Thor himself.
legendary_hammer_recipe.flavor: "He, whomsoever holds this Hammer, If he be worthy..."

steel_axe_2h_recipe.description: A double handed axe, Not for trees.
steel_axe_2h_recipe.flavor: "try spinning in circles. that might work!" -Bor the Brave, discussing fighting styles

iron_axe_2h_recipe.flavor: not too great at defence, but will sure as hell give the other guy issues

legendary_axe_haft.flavor: "Enchanted with powerful spells and strong as the mountain... And then you mistook it for a chairleg.." -Bor Flamesbane, Master Blacksmith
legendary_axe_haft.description: A Haft Strong enough to be used for a Legendary Axe

legendary_axe_head.flavor: It can cut through armor.. and still cut a tomato!
legendary_axe_head.description: An Axehead, of the Legendary variety

legendary_axe_recipe.flavor: Instilled in its steel are powerful spells. It bites as if winter itself.

throwing_axe.description: A Throwin Axe, used by a Skirmisher

einherjar_axe_offhand_steel_recipe.flavor: It has tiny runes reading: "Heavy as the flow of time, and cuts just as deep"
einherjar_axe_offhand_steel_recipe.description: Wielded by a Hersir, it brings any attack to a halt.

einherjar_axe_steel_recipe.description: For Fighting the really big fights.
einherjar_axe_steel_recipe.flavor: "My scales are Shields, my teeth are like Swords, my wings are the Hurricane, but even I can get slain by this dragons bane" -Unnamed dragon

einherjar_sword_steel_recipe.flavor: "I never did know where "sword" ended and "wall of sharp steel" starts..-Narfi the mad Blacksmith
einherjar_sword_steel_recipe.description: A huge blade, made for a Hersir

silver_helmet_recipe.description: A runic comb that takes care of your hair. Let your hair take care of you!

hersir_talisman.description: Required to promote a Huskarl into a Hersir
hersir_talisman.flavor: "when is it sharp enough?" "when its cutting edge is sharper than Loki's cutting words" -unknown smith to his aprentice

runic_wooden_comb.description: A runic comb that takes care of your hair. Let your hair take care of you!
runic_wooden_comb.flavor: Also does wonders for your beard!

training_roundshield.description: A basic wooden shield, without cover
training_roundshield.flavor: doubles as a sled in emergencies!

wooden_round_shield.description: A well made wooden roundshield, covered in linen

comfy_fur_bed.flavor: Winter might be coming, but not to this bed!

wooden_chair_fur.flavor: Just make sure not to accidentally sit on the cat!

decorative_wall_shield_recipe.description: Easier to make than a shield, but just as decorative!
decorative_wall_shield_recipe.flavor: Nordlings don't wait behind a shield wall, we strike first!

wooden_chair_nordlings.flavor: "Ancient legend says good things come in threes. So why not legs?"
wooden_chair_nordlings.description: A three legged chair, favored by the Nordlings

ornate_comfy_fur_bed.description: A bed, suitable for Nordling aristocracy

carpenter_toolbench_nordlings_recipe.flavor: "Olaf! Get back here with that carved dragons head!" -Snorri
carpenter_toolbench_nordlings_recipe.description: A nordling toolbench, usable by a carpenter.

carpenter_workbench_nordlings_recipe.description: Used by a carpenter to make furniture
carpenter_workbench_nordlings_recipe.flavor: "it might just be a split treetrunk to you, but its the start of Home to me" -Olaf Woodsplitter

firewood3x.description: used to stoke fireplaces, as fuel.
firewood3x.flavor: "you mean putting an ENTIRE treetrunk in a fireplace is NOT the way to go about it?"- Raya

ornate_wooden_chair_nordlings.description: A Nordling chair, covered with comfy padding. Looks snazzy too!
ornate_wooden_chair_nordlings.flavor: Sit on three legs, with style!

map_table.description: A Table to plan your strategies on.
map_table.flavor: in the lower right corner it says "Veni Vidi Vici" in very small print indeed.

big_barrel.flavor: Try not to drink it in one piece, unless you are Thor.

nord_chest_recipe.description: Stores up to 64 items. Useful for keeping things in the house, but also at sea!
nord_chest_recipe.flavor: Ivaldi's sons in days of old fashioned special chests to keep what is theirs from wet and cold.

wooden_spear_recipe.description: Required to promote a Villager into a Huskarl.
wooden_spear_recipe.flavor: All great warriors have humble beginnings.

wooden_hill_fort_door.flavor: Keeps out pesky things like Ice Giants, and door-to-door salesmen.

composite_longbow_recipe.description: A long bow made out of multiple materials, improving its performance

wooden_portcullis.flavor: placeholder: seriously if you have a good one post it on the mod page!
wooden_portcullis.description: A wooden portcullis to keep the baddies out. is lockable.

basic_shelter.description: Keeps you dry when sleeping outside, better than the floor
basic_shelter.flavor: “It always rains on shelters. Rainstorms will travel thousands of miles, against prevailing winds for the opportunity to rain on a shelter."

torch.description: Simple light in the dark, and otherwise a stick to fend things off with!
torch.flavor: In order for the light to shine so brightly, the darkness must be present.

basic_shelter_improved.description: Keeps you dry when sleeping outside, improved with a warm thatching.
basic_shelter_improved.flavor: "What do you actually need? Food, clothing and shelter. Everything else is entertainment."  -Len Highwall

rune_stone.description: A carved stone, with runic sigils.

stone_axe.description: An Axe with a stone axehead.

fireplace.description: The floorplate for a fireplace, burns wood and keeps you warm.
fireplace.flavor: Keeps the home warm at night

comfy_fur_bed_stone_recipe.description: A stone bed with comfy fur pelts to sleep under.
comfy_fur_bed_stone_recipe.flavor: You may be sleeping on stone, but you're doing it in style!

fireplace_big.flavor: Keeps the mead hall warm at night
fireplace_big.description: For when the small one just isn't enough.

shrine_to_odin_recipe.description: A shrine to Odin one-eye, King of the Gods.
shrine_to_odin_recipe.flavor: "Do not forget, where Thor hurls his hammer under guidance of a thunderstorm, Odin prefers to strike from a clear sky."

shrine_to_thor_recipe.description: A shrine to Thor, Mighty God of Thunder
shrine_to_thor_recipe.flavor: The runes describe how great craftmanship knows no bounds, and praise the glory of Thor

decorative_wall_dragon_recipe.description: A dragon carved out of wood

knight_outfit.description: Metal armor worn by a Hersir

knight_description.description: A chosen military commander, inspiring the troops to battle for glory.

level_1_data.perk_000_description: Increases Stamina, Courage, and draws attention from monsters
level_1_data.perk_001_description: The Hersir gains an additional 10% defense from equipment

level_4_data.perk_000_description: The Hersir gains an additional 20% armor from equipment

level_5_data.perk_000_description: The Hersir boosts courage of everyone around

level_2_data.perk_000_description: The Hersir Challenges the enemy, drawing their attack

level_6_data.perk_000_description: The Hersir sounds a horn of combat, drawing the attention enemies both near and far

defense_1_buff.description: Defense gained from equipment increased by 10%

defense_2_buff.description: Defense gained from equipment increased by 20%

health_1_buff.description: The Hersir becomes more menacing to enemies, drawing their attention in combat. They also get a health and stamina bonus to keep up.

courage_aura_buff.description: The Hersir increases courage of everyone around

courage_aura_effect_buff.description: Courage increased from the presence of a Hersir.

knight_helm.description: Iron headgear standard issue for all Hersirs

worker_description.description: Villagers perform basic tasks like harvesting resources, hauling stuff around, and constructing buildings, in addition to tending the fields.

worker_outfit_fancy_iconic.description: Fancy clothes, keeps the cold out and the productivity IN

worker_outfit_fancy.description: Fancy clothes, keeps the cold out and the productivity IN

legendary_hammer_mounting.description: Made of Highly conductive gold, it sparks to the touch.
legendary_hammer_mounting.flavor: "did anyone see that flash just now?"

porridge_recipe.description: A hot, filling meal to start the day with
porridge_recipe.flavor: "i'd love to add some berries, then it might taste a bit sweeter..."

butter_recipe.description: Produces butter, and buttermilk (one of each)
butter_recipe.flavor: "now listen carefully young Nordling, do not throw out the buttermilk, it will make you big and strong!" -Nordling elder

juice_bramble_recipe.description: Create a fruity beverage from bramble berries.

ruler_sword.description: A sword fit for a Ruler

ruler_description.description: A Lord, to lead your people.
ruler_description.requirements: Proof of the Right to Rule

ruler_description_na.description: A Chieftain, to lead your people.

ruler_description_rc.description: A Sultan, Here to lead your people.

level_1_data.perk_000_description: Your Lord knows that all battles may have mortal consequences, and attacks with renewed determination.

level_2_data.perk_000_description: Your Lord charges into battle with speed.

level_3_data.perk_000_description: Your Lord boosts courage of everyone around.

level_5_data.perk_000_description: A slashing strike that deals damage to up to 4 enemies around your Lord.

level_6_data.perk_000_description: Your Lord inspires those around him to fight harder. (Strength Buff)

level_1_data.perk_000_description: Your Chieftain knows that all battles may have mortal consequences, and attacks with renewed determination.

level_2_data.perk_000_description: Your Chieftain charges into battle with speed.

level_3_data.perk_000_description: Your Chieftain boosts courage of everyone around.

level_5_data.perk_000_description: A slashing strike that deals damage to up to 4 enemies around your Chieftain.

level_6_data.perk_000_description: Your Chieftain inspires those around him to fight harder. (Strength Buff)

level_1_data.perk_000_description: Your Jarl knows that all battles may have mortal consequences, and attacks with renewed determination.

level_2_data.perk_000_description: Your Jarl charges into battle with speed.

level_3_data.perk_000_description: Your Jarl boosts the courage of everyone around.

level_5_data.perk_000_description: A slashing strike that deals damage to up to 4 enemies around your Jarl.

level_6_data.perk_000_description: Your Jarl leads from the front, inspiring those around him to fight harder. (Strength Buff)

level_1_data.perk_000_description: Your Sultan knows that all battles may have mortal consequences, and attacks with renewed determination.

level_2_data.perk_000_description: Your Sultan charges into battle with speed.

level_3_data.perk_000_description: Your Sultan boosts courage of everyone around.

level_5_data.perk_000_description: A slashing strike that deals damage to up to 4 enemies around your Sultan.

level_6_data.perk_000_description: Your Sultan inspires those around him to fight harder. (Strength Buff)

archer_description.description: A ranged combat unit that shoots foes with arrows

level_1_data.perk_000_description: The Skirmisher is able to use a bow to shoot arrows at enemies

level_2_data.perk_000_description: The Skirmisher's shots ignore 50% of the target's armor

level_3_data.perk_000_description: The Skirmisher can attack enemies from further away

level_5_data.perk_000_description: The Skirmisher can attack enemies from very far away

level_4_data.perk_000_description: The Skirmisher shoots arrows with greater speed

level_6_data.perk_000_description: The Skirmisher learns the ancient art of quick shots, allowing rapid firing of two arrows in rapid succession

cleric_scroll.description: The skald uses its knowledge of the old ways to heal you and your allies.

cleric_scroll_talisman.description: Used to promote a herbalist into a Skald
